results.title: First report of type 2 diabetes mellitus in an adult with 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A lyase deficiency
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was discharged home on @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ glargine 36 units s.c. at bedtime and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 500 mg twice daily for the management of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@, and his prior treatment regimen for @<m>DISEASE_3_Hydroxy_3_Methylglutaryl_CoA_Lyase_Deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C538324 @@@HMG-CoA lyase deficiency@@@ was resumed.

citations.NLM: Lai V, Shahidi M, Chan A, Jain-Ghai S. First report of type 2 diabetes mellitus in an adult with 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A lyase deficiency Endocrinol Diabetes Metab Case Rep. 2023 Mar 1;2023():. PMID: 36988218
